character.statement: Oh no, I lost some of my favorite things! Would you please help me find them? I'll reward ya, kindly stranger!
Bingo-Bango! If you want to play another game, come back over and talk to me!
Wanna help me find my things again?
This movin' picture is mighty funny. Can't stop watchin'.
Ya'll will have a great time running around Poptropica with my boy, Cricket. Play the game, get your prize then try it out.
Good thing I have a sword! The subway is no good and full of hidden dangers.
